original_text: The rest were killed with the sword coming out of the mouth of the rider on the horse, and all the birds gorged themselves on their flesh.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 말 탄 자의 입으로부터 나오는 검에 죽으매 모든 새가 그들의 살로 배불리더라

sentences.original_text: with the sword coming out of the mouth
of the rider on the horse
and all the birds gorged themselves on their flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 새들이 그들의 살을 탐食했다
